scripts.build:prod: cleancss -o resume/css/resume.min.css resume/css/resume.css && rollup js/index.js --format iife --name "siteBundle" --file js/bundle.js && BUILD_ENV=production npx @11ty/eleventy && npm run clean:orphaned
scripts.build:prod:watch: cleancss -o resume/css/resume.min.css resume/css/resume.css; rollup js/index.js --format iife --name "siteBundle" --file js/bundle.js; BUILD_ENV=production npx @11ty/eleventy --watch
